feed.title: The Dias Lab
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: Goodbye Abbie!
entry.content: Our floor had a blast celebrating Abbie and welcoming Anna & Nicole. Thank you to Abbie for all you have done in getting the lab situated, we will miss you!
entry.summary: Our floor had a blast celebrating Abbie and welcoming Anna & Nicole. Thank you to Abbie for all you have done in getting the lab situated, we will miss you!
